name: Add
description: Adds two values and pushes the result onto the evaluation stack.

name: Beq
description: Transfers control to a target instruction if two values are equal.

name: Ldloca_S
description: Loads the address of the local variable at a specific index onto the evaluation stack, short form.

name: Ldstr
description: Pushes a new object reference to a string literal stored in the metadata.
